net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.hw

Class NV21Convertor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.hw.NV21Convertor

  • public class NV21Convertor
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts from NV21 to YUV420 semi planar or planar.
